item.title: Authorization header in Swagger UI
item.description: I was setting up JWT authentication for APIs of my spring boot app and wanted to test them from swagger-ui, but could not find a direct answer in my google searches. So adding my tweaks to get this done, as an entry here. The quickest way to get this done is to configure a global parameter in the Docket bean, which will show up on all APIs. I have added my swagger config here.

item.title: Backup org files in github
item.description:
tl;dr I used the snippets here to backup my emacs org files, however it can be used for any file. The cron-job invokes backup_files_to_github.sh, once every 15 minutes, to push org files available in the ~/org directory to a github repository.
NOWT=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %T") git add . git commit -m "$NOWTAutomated git push" git push Code Snippet 1: backup_files_to_github.sh */15 * * * * cd ~/org && .
